Considering that Facebook can easily become a 1 billion-users-platform, when it does that, it can become more like Google and will be worth more than$ 50 billion. The fact that Facebook, Groupon and Twitter could become$ 100 billion companies doesn't mean that their competitors will, too. Google's Eric Schmidt said in another interview at the World Economic Forum that the high value attributed to some young companies is on par with their future potential. NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers .
